eu.execom.testutil
Class AbstractExecomRepositoryAssert<EntityType,EntityId>

java.lang.Object
  junit.framework.Assert
      eu.execom.testutil.AbstractExecomAssert<EntityType>
          eu.execom.testutil.AbstractExecomRepositoryAssert<EntityType,EntityId>
Type Parameters:
EntityType - Entity type that all tested entities must implement.
EntityId - type of entity id
All Implemented Interfaces:
EntityAssert<EntityType>, ExecomRepositoryAssert<EntityType,EntityId>
public abstract class AbstractExecomRepositoryAssert<EntityType,EntityId>
extends AbstractExecomAssert<EntityType>
implements ExecomRepositoryAssert<EntityType,EntityId>

ExeCom test util class. Extends AbstractExecomAssert with possibility to assert entire repository (DB ...) . TODO think of better comment.

Author:
Dusko Vesin, Nikola Olah, Bojan Babic, Nikola Trkulja

Parameters:

markAsAsserted

protected boolean markAsAsserted(EntityType entity,
                                 Class<?> actualType)
Mark entity bean as asserted in db snapshot map. Go trough all its supper classes and if its possible assert it.

Parameters:
entity - the entity
actualType - the actual type
Returns:
true if entity is successfully asserted else return false.

assertByEntity

protected <X extends EntityType> boolean assertByEntity(Map<EntityId,CopyAssert<X>> beforeEntities,
                                                        List<X> afterEntities,
                                                        AssertReportBuilder report)
Asserts all entities of same type in current snapshot with ones from before snapshot.

Type Parameters:
X - type of the entities
Parameters:
beforeEntities - entities from before snapshot
afterEntities - entities from current snapshot
report - report builder
Returns:
true if all entities from before snapshot are asserted with entities from current snapshot, false otherwise

validateEntry

protected <X extends EntityType> boolean validateEntry(List<EntityId> ids,
                                                       Map.Entry<EntityId,CopyAssert<X>> beforeEntry,
                                                       List<X> afterEntities,
                                                       AssertReportBuilder report)
Validates entity by checking if entity is already asserted if not, then checks if entity from before snapshot has its match in current snapshot.

Type Parameters:
X - type of the entities
Parameters:
ids - asserted entity ids
beforeEntry - entity from before snapshot
afterEntities - entities from current snapshot
report - report builder
Returns:
true if entity from before snapshot is already asserted or if it has match in current snapshot and is asserted with it, false otherwise

assertEntities

protected <X extends EntityType> boolean assertEntities(X beforeEntity,
                                                        X afterEntity,
                                                        AssertReportBuilder report)
Calls assertObjects of AbstractExecomAssert to assert two entities.

Type Parameters:
X - the generic type
Parameters:
beforeEntity - entity from before snapshot
afterEntity - entity from current snapshot
report - report builder
Returns:
true if entities are asserted, i.e. assertObjects doesn't throw AssertionError, false otherwise
